001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core.config;
002
003import java.util.Locale;
004
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.biome.Precipitation;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.i18n.I18N;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.i18n.Renderable;
008import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
009
010import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
011import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.meta.NodeKey;
012import org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.meta.Required;
013
014import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
015
016public record Season(
017    @NodeKey String name,
018    @Required Vector3 color,
019    @Nullable ColorModifier foliageColor,
020    @Nullable ColorModifier grassColor,
021    @Nullable ColorModifier fogColor,
022    @Nullable ColorModifier skyColor,
023    @Nullable ColorModifier waterColor,
024    @Nullable ColorModifier waterFogColor,
025    @Nullable Precipitation precipitation
026) implements Renderable {
027    public static final String SEASON = "season";
028
029    @Override
030    public Component render(I18N i18n, Locale locale) {
031        return i18n.line(locale, SEASON + "." + name);
032    }
033}
